title: ranked 5's looking for top and mid
body:
Hey all,

I'm looking to make a team in the hopes of improving communication in a team environment, focusing on teamwork, team compositions and macro performance.
Please fill out your details below and post them in the comments, I'll add and trial you if we're interested~

Age:
Role:
Top 3 Picks:
Comms (Y/N):
Time Zone:
Availability:

Thanks
 {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:

Role: mid
Top 3 picks: Kat main, Orianna, Zed
Comms: Yes

Avaliability: week day nights, weekends
IGN: WQLFY

tried to add you several times but it will not work..?

willing to play meta picks for top lane?
yes, i have been trying out daruis and wanting to keep trying the meta champs, i was just showing my safe picks
